black.content: Lots of Black Ribboners hyperfixate on _.
_ is taxed heavily in Überwald, so it's mostly dealt in illegally.
There's a roll of thunder every time we mention _.
_ is illegal in Überwald!
Is _ really that shocking in Überwald? _.
Why swear off blood when you can swear off _ instead?
Why get struck by lightning when you can get struck by _?
We keep getting sent pictures of _ down the clacks.
Wouldn't _ look beautiful silhouetted by flashing lightning?
Werewolves hate _. Well-known fact.
_ doesn't belong in Überwald.
Dwarfs hate _. Well-known fact.
Every time I mention _, there's a handy flash of lightning outside.
Vampires hate _. Well-known fact.
What does Baron Guye masturbate to? _.
It's very difficult to get hold of _ in Überwald.
The most common Black Ribboner hyperfixations are _, _, and _.
Visit Überwald, it's _!
You can attract werewolves with _, you know.
What does Lady Serafine masturbate to? _.
Vampires are attracted to the scent of _, so be careful.
Vampires love _. Well-known fact.
Werewolves love _. Well-known fact.
What does Lady Margolotta masturbate to? _.
Dwarfs love _. Well-known fact.

white: Revealing the entire bosom with one's corset.
The howling of some far-off wolves.
Making lots of jokes about being undead.
The subtle ripple of the curtains in your bedroom.
Constant fights between vampires and werewolves.
A nice stockpile of holy symbols.
The perfectly timed flash of lightning outside.
Showing up on a vampire's doorstep, soaking wet and shivering.
How beautiful the full Überwaldian moon looks, swathed in dark mists.
Distant, ethereal music of which you dare not speak.
Not wearing silver jewellery because of the burning sensation and steam.
Wearing a great deal more leather than you need to.
A rare sunny day in Überwald.
Making lots of jokes about how red your wine is.
Running slowly enough that your cape billows very attractively.
A rare waning moon in Überwald.
Real bats thinking you're good fun.
Gasping in a soft, enticing manner.
Making lots of jokes about fleas, leashes, and dog stuff.
Carrying a drop of blood around your neck for when you're turned to dust.
Tourists saying things like, "better be-yonk than be-yoink!".
Going all the way out to Escrow.
Getting embarrassingly excited when someone mentions walkies.
A drop of blood that lingers on the lip of your new friend.
Our tourism slogan, "Come to Überwald: it's a scream!".
A very tightly laced piece of corsetry.
A small dog that looks more like a rat.
Lady Margolotta's affair with her librarian.
A nice dress made of leather and rubber.
Baring one's neck as one swoons attractively.
The danger of bleeding on any of the dust in Überwald.
Having territorial biffs with actual dogs and wolves.
Plenty of tourists to add to the larder. Er, I mean, economy.
Very willing volunteers to go see Lady Margolotta.
Captain Tantony of the Bonk Watch.
The Low Queen of the dwarfs.
Making sure a few young ladies to go up to "visit" with Lady Margolotta once a month.
Winning prizes as a champion sheepdog in Borogravia.
Wearing a pink jumper with bats on.
Getting chased by gangs of werewolves.
Slapping your foot against the floor when your wife rubs your shoulder.
Fainting delicately at the sight of blood.
A castle that reminds one of a highly decorative cake.
Real wolves thinking you're a twat.
Trying to make sure you're the sexiest werewolf in the room.
Wearing thigh-high boots so that people know you're a SEXY vampire.
Miles and miles of bloody Überwald.
A lot of sexy, sexy werewolves.
Alvays talkink like zis so people are knowink how sexy you are.
A lot of sexy, sexy vampires.
Trying to make sure you're the sexiest vampire in the room.

pack.name: Life On The Disc: Uberwald Edition
